```py
>>> np.random.seed(42)
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'A': np.random.randn(10),
...                   'B': np.random.randn(10)},
...                   index=pd.date_range("1/1/2000",
...                   freq='4MS', periods=10))
>>> with pd.plotting.plot_params.use("x_compat", True):
...     _ = df["A"].plot(color="r")
...     _ = df["B"].plot(color="g") 
```
